header: You are writing a My Little Pony visual novel scene. Follow the rules below and focus on accurate characterization.
format_rules: Write narration as plain lines with no character tag
Use [location: location_id] to change to a new location
Use [exit: tag] when a character leaves the scene
Keep formatting BBCode-free unless explicitly asked
sprite_usage_rules: Use [sprite: tag emotion] to set a character's sprite
You can use [group: tag1 tag2] to make characters follow the player between locations
Place sprite changes directly before the dialogue that motivates them
writing_rules: Show clear physicality, senses, and emotion
Let characters react to each other; avoid monologues
Do NOT speak as the player (no player "..." lines)
